title: Himalia
description: Himalia is the general name of the SDK library of the pallet-contracts contract module built by Patract for a series of access chains in different languages. For Substrate, there are already some SDKs for access chains in different languages. However, due to the particularity of the pallet-contracts module, it is necessary to continue to build an SDK based on the access contract module on the SDK of the access chain. Its particularity is mainly manifested in:
